review: One of my favorite gifts from my daughter!!Works beautifully! And great content!

review: Easy to install and love it!
author: wv gal

review: Hard to use search and to enter passwords.  Have to pay extra for almost everything on prime that I want to see.  But I can use Netflix on it which is free.

review: I highly recommend the amazon fire tv. It's great if you want to get rid of the expensive cable bills.

review: Wish I could use my iPad to remotely work this thing. Has known to stop streaming and have had to restart the program.

review: Amazing device, VERY VERY fast.  100% satisfied.  As a previous Apple TV user, I LOVE the speed of the Fire TV.
author: Rob
